OrgName: Law Offices of Palmer, Reifler & Associates, P.A.
activities: Law Firm receives theft incident reports from UK client that may contain information such as the name, address,telephone number, date of birth and gender of an alleged shoplifter or dishonest employee.  Law Firm creates a case file and forwards civil settlement offers  to the alleged shoplifter or dishonest employee.
